title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 419.3 - Departmental review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 419.3 - Departmental review

State Regulations

The department will review proposals and notify districts
of their eligibility for grant awards not later than 45 days after the date
specified by the commissioner for submission of proposals pursuant to section
419.2
of this Part. Proposals will
be judged by criteria which shall include: (a) the project's adherence to the guidelines
and the priorities stated in the request for proposal distributed by the
department; (b) the feasibility of
the project's approach and work plan to accomplish its objectives; (c) the extent to which the funding will be
used to expand existing services; and
(d) the likelihood that the project has
potential for continuing beyond the project funding period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
419.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
